import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; const About = (props) => { return (

CryptAlgo Cryptocurrency Trading Tool

What is CryptAlgo?

“CryptAlgo” is a cryptocurrency scanner and algorithmic trader. As cryptocurrency is gaining mainstream attention due to the rise of Bitcoin, the unregulated market space is becoming more popular which creates more opportunities for the investor with the proper tools. This app is designed as such a tool with the use of data from the leading crypto exchanges and market information.

Why use CryptAlgo?

CryptAlgo provides a list of benefits to traders. Some of these benefits include but are not limited to executed trades at the best possible prices, instant order placement, reduced transaction costs, reduced risk of manual errors and reduced possibility of trading errors due to human emotional and psychological factors. Reduced transaction costs. Simultaneous automated checks on multiple market conditions. Reduced risk of manual errors when placing trades. Algo-trading can be backtested using available historical and real-time data to see if it is a viable trading strategy. Reduced the possibility of mistakes by human traders based on emotional and psychological factors.

 .col-6 .col-sm-4 .col-6 .col-sm-4 .col-sm-4
); } export default About;
